snippet: DealBook live blogged Berkshire Hathaway’s annual shareholder meeting, where analysts and investors again focused on Warren E. Buffett’s succession plans.
abstract: DealBook live blogged Berkshire Hathaway’s annual shareholder meeting, where analysts and investors again focused on Warren E. Buffett’s succession plans.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Buffett Talks Succession and Taxes at Berkshire Annual Meeting
